G

getBase() - Method in class at.TimoCraft.TimoCloud.api.objects.GroupObject
If two groups are started by the same base, you can assume that they are running on the same machine.
getBukkitInstance() - Static method in class at.TimoCraft.TimoCloud.api.TimoCloudAPI
This API is for Bukkit plugins
getCurrentPlayers() - Method in interface at.TimoCraft.TimoCloud.api.objects.ServerObject
The servers current player count can be faked by manipulating ServerListPingEvent
getCurrentPlayers(String) - Method in interface at.TimoCraft.TimoCloud.api.TimoCloudBukkitAPI
Deprecated.
Use TimoCloudAPI.getUniversalInstance() to get the TimoCloudUniversalAPI, use TimoCloudUniversalAPI.getServer(String) to get wanted server and use getCurrentPlayers() to get the servers current player count
getExtra() - Method in interface at.TimoCraft.TimoCloud.api.objects.ServerObject
An extra is a custom value users can set per API.
getExtra() - Method in interface at.TimoCraft.TimoCloud.api.TimoCloudBukkitAPI
Deprecated.
Use TimoCloudBukkitAPI.getThisServer() to get the ServerObject and use getExtra() to get the extra
getExtra(String) - Method in interface at.TimoCraft.TimoCloud.api.TimoCloudBukkitAPI
Deprecated.
Use TimoCloudAPI.getUniversalInstance() to get the TimoCloudUniversalAPI, use TimoCloudUniversalAPI.getServer(String) to get wanted server and use getExtra() to get the servers extra
getGroup() - Method in interface at.TimoCraft.TimoCloud.api.objects.ServerObject
 
getGroup(String) - Method in interface at.TimoCraft.TimoCloud.api.TimoCloudUniversalAPI
Use this to get a group by name
getGroupName() - Method in interface at.TimoCraft.TimoCloud.api.objects.ServerObject
Use this method if you only need the groups name - it is more performant than retrieving the group object by name as getGroup() does
getGroups() - Method in interface at.TimoCraft.TimoCloud.api.TimoCloudUniversalAPI
Use this to get all groups
getIpAddress() - Method in interface at.TimoCraft.TimoCloud.api.objects.ServerObject
 
getMap() - Method in interface at.TimoCraft.TimoCloud.api.objects.ServerObject
If a servers map is assigned randomly, the map name will be the part of the map directories name after the '_'.
getMapName() - Method in interface at.TimoCraft.TimoCloud.api.TimoCloudBukkitAPI
Deprecated.
Use TimoCloudBukkitAPI.getThisServer() to get the ServerObject and use getMap() to get the map
getMapName(String) - Method in interface at.TimoCraft.TimoCloud.api.TimoCloudBukkitAPI
Deprecated.
Use TimoCloudAPI.getUniversalInstance() to get the TimoCloudUniversalAPI, use TimoCloudUniversalAPI.getServer(String) to get wanted server and use getMap() to get the servers map
getMaxAmount() - Method in class at.TimoCraft.TimoCloud.api.objects.GroupObject
The MaxAmount specifies the maximal amount of servers TimoCloud keeps online at the same time - no matter what startupAmount says
getMaxPlayers() - Method in interface at.TimoCraft.TimoCloud.api.objects.ServerObject

Deprecated.
Use TimoCloudAPI.getUniversalInstance() to get the TimoCloudUniversalAPI, use TimoCloudUniversalAPI.getServer(String) to get wanted server and use getMaxPlayers() to get the servers maximal player count
getMotd() - Method in interface at.TimoCraft.TimoCloud.api.objects.ServerObject
The servers MOTD (= message of the day) can be faked by manipulating ServerListPingEvent
getName() - Method in class at.TimoCraft.TimoCloud.api.objects.GroupObject
 
getName() - Method in interface at.TimoCraft.TimoCloud.api.objects.ServerObject
 
getOnlineServersByGroup(String) - Method in interface at.TimoCraft.TimoCloud.api.TimoCloudBukkitAPI
Deprecated.
Use TimoCloudAPI.getUniversalInstance(), get the wanted group by TimoCloudUniversalAPI.getGroup(String) and get the servers by GroupObject.getServers() Returns a list of server names registered in BungeeCord by TimoCloud. For example, you can use it to send a player to a random lobby server: Attention! When calling the first time, the method will return an empty list and will only add the group to the list of groups which should be queried. So call the method once you enable your plugin!
getPort() - Method in interface at.TimoCraft.TimoCloud.api.objects.ServerObject
 
getRam() - Method in class at.TimoCraft.TimoCloud.api.objects.GroupObject
Maximum of ram a server of this group may use
getServer(String) - Method in interface at.TimoCraft.TimoCloud.api.TimoCloudUniversalAPI
Use this to get a server by name
getServerName() - Method in interface at.TimoCraft.TimoCloud.api.TimoCloudBukkitAPI
 
getServers() - Method in class at.TimoCraft.TimoCloud.api.objects.GroupObject
Returns all starting/running servers of the group
getSocketAddress() - Method in interface at.TimoCraft.TimoCloud.api.objects.ServerObject
 
getSortOutStates() - Method in class at.TimoCraft.TimoCloud.api.objects.GroupObject
If a state of a server is included in the list of sortOut states, TimoCloud does not count the server as online server.
getStartupAmount() - Method in class at.TimoCraft.TimoCloud.api.objects.GroupObject
The StartupAmount or Keep-Online-Amount is the amount of servers TimoCloud wants to always be online.
getState() - Method in interface at.TimoCraft.TimoCloud.api.objects.ServerObject
 
getState() - Method in interface at.TimoCraft.TimoCloud.api.TimoCloudBukkitAPI
Deprecated.
Use TimoCloudBukkitAPI.getThisServer() to get the ServerObject and use getState() to get the state
getState(String) - Method in interface at.TimoCraft.TimoCloud.api.TimoCloudBukkitAPI
Deprecated.
Use TimoCloudAPI.getUniversalInstance() to get the TimoCloudUniversalAPI, use TimoCloudUniversalAPI.getServer(String) to get wanted server and use getState() to get the servers state
getThisServer() - Method in interface at.TimoCraft.TimoCloud.api.TimoCloudBukkitAPI
 
getUniversalInstance() - Static method in class at.TimoCraft.TimoCloud.api.TimoCloudAPI
You can use this API on both, BungeeCord and Bukkit
GroupObject - Class in at.TimoCraft.TimoCloud.api.objects
 
GroupObject() - Constructor for class at.TimoCraft.TimoCloud.api.objects.GroupObject
Do not use this - this will be done by TimoCloud
GroupObject(List<ServerObject>, String, int, int, int, boolean, String, List<String>) - Constructor for class at.TimoCraft.TimoCloud.api.objects.GroupObject
Do not use this - this will be done by TimoCloud

I

isRandomMap() - Method in interface at.TimoCraft.TimoCloud.api.TimoCloudBukkitAPI
Deprecated.
You don't need to know if the map has been chosen randomly
isSortedOut() - Method in interface at.TimoCraft.TimoCloud.api.objects.ServerObject
 
isStatic() - Method in class at.TimoCraft.TimoCloud.api.objects.GroupObject
If a group is static, servers will not be reset after restart.

S

sendCommandToBungeeCord(String) - Method in interface at.TimoCraft.TimoCloud.api.TimoCloudBukkitAPI
The given command will be executed on BungeeCord
sendPlayerToRandomServerOfGroup(Player, String) - Method in interface at.TimoCraft.TimoCloud.api.TimoCloudBukkitAPI
Deprecated.
Use TimoCloudAPI.getUniversalInstance(), get the wanted group by using TimoCloudUniversalAPI.getGroup(String), get the servers by GroupObject.getServers(), get a random server from the list, use getName() to get its name and send to player to the server as shown here: https://goo.gl/rMvKwE Sends a player to a random server of a given group. Attention! This calls the method getOnlineServersByGroup(String group), so you have to be aware of the same thing as mentioned above: Calling the method the first time will not have any affect, just to add the group to the list of groups which should be queried. So call the method getOnlineServersByGroup(String group) when loading your plugin.

Do not use this method.

Deprecated.

setState(String) - Method in interface at.TimoCraft.TimoCloud.api.objects.ServerObject

setUniversalImplementation(TimoCloudUniversalAPI) - Static method in class at.TimoCraft.TimoCloud.api.TimoCloudAPI
